name: Blocks tower
description:
Blocks tower: A little tower builder game. Enjoy building your tower and watch people burn.

Tips:

- Make more room for new residents by putting more blocks.
- A green block will supply food for residents.
- put multiple blocks in horizontal will increase more room than multiple single blocks or multiple blocks in vertical.
- Residents happiness depend on a full stomach and a number of resident per room.
- Sad residents tend to set the room on fire.
- Fire can prune several residents.
- Fire always spread to up or side blocks. 
- Have a gap between blocks can prevent a fire from spreading.
- A burnt green block will change into a normal block.
- A ticker text contains useful tips.

Control:
- left, right arrow for move cursor.
- up arrow for put a block.
